title: Is it disrespectful to touch the Quran (Mushaf or Phone) with sweaty hands? #Assim #assim al hakeem
transcript: my hands are often like they get sweaty when I hold things so like when I hold my phone and read Quran or like uh or hold the mus itself and read Quran my hands get uh like sweaty and I fear that this might be disrespectful but it's very hard to avoid because like it's not my choice so um is it disrespectful to hold the Quran with sweaty hands or what should I do no it is not disrespectful
